nodes.text: The bog moon of Bogden was a moon of the Inner Rim planet Bogden. It was used as a hideout by the pirate Gir Kybo Ren-Cha after he made his escape from Tammuz-an, bringing along Princess Gerin Toda as a hostage. It was on the bog moon that he was recaptured in a skirmish between his gang and the Tammuz-an warriors led by Lord Malameu Toda and King Mon Julpa.
